text: Ed O'Ross (born July 4, 1946) is an American actor. He is best known for playing Itchy in Dick Tracy, ruthless Georgian mobster Viktor Rostavili in Red Heat, and tough-then-alien-possessed police detective Cliff Willis in The Hidden. O'Ross was born Edward Oross in Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania,Ed O'Ross Biography (1946-) ==References== ==Other websites== * * Category:1946 births Category:Living people Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American stage actors Category:American voice actors Category:Actors from Pittsburgh
title: Ed O'Ross
